casebody.data:
Othel L. BRADSHAW, Petitioner, v. DEPARTMENT OF VETERANS AFFAIRS, Respondent. No. 05-3070. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. May 9, 2005.

Before NEWMAN, CLEVENGER, and GAJARSA, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
